title: American Community Survey, 2012
description:
Description
Results from the US Census American Community Survey, 2012.

parameters.citizen: Whether the person is a U.S. citizen.
parameters.birth_qrtr:
The quarter of the year that the person was born,
e.g. ⁠Jan thru Mar⁠.
parameters.time_to_work: Travel time to work, in minutes.

format: A data frame with 2000 observations on the following 13 variables.
